articles.author: Helen Pidd
articles.title: 'Tatty-bye, Doddy': Liverpool bids farewell to Ken Dodd
articles.description: Gags, tickling sticks and crowds five-deep marked the funeral of the vaudevillian comedian

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Burger chain sues YouTube 'prankster'
articles.description: The accused is alleged to have posed as the firm's chief executive and abused its food.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Canadian mosque gunman pleads guilty
articles.description: Alexandre Bissonnette, 28, admits six counts of murder and six of attempted murder.

articles.author: Heather Stewart
articles.title: Ruling Dan Jarvis can't be mayor and MP 'undemocratic', say supporters
articles.description: MPs want the NEC to reverse decision, made just days before Jarvis won Sheffield nomination

articles.author: Jose A. Del Real
articles.title: Hundreds at Sacramento City Hall Protest Police Killing of Stephon Clark
articles.description: Black leaders expressed frustration about the shooting death of an unarmed black man last week. California’s attorney general has taken over the investigation.

articles.author: Richard Fausset and Alan Blinder
articles.title: Baton Rouge Officers Will Not Be Charged in Alton Sterling’s Killing
articles.description: The Louisiana attorney general’s decision came almost a year after federal prosecutors declined to file charges in connection with the fatal shooting.

articles.author: Anne Perkins
articles.title: Labour MPs attending antisemitism protest targeted for deselection
articles.description: Social media backlash as David Lammy accused of ‘stabbing Labour members in the back’

articles.author: Vikram Dodd
articles.title: Police make arrest in hunt for Hatton Garden heist ringleader
articles.description: Detectives are hunting mysterious figure known only as ‘Basil’ for the £14m burglary

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Body of actress 'found' in US wilderness
articles.description: The body was discovered hundreds of miles from the Hollywood home of the 25-year-old missing woman.

articles.author: Patrick Strickland
articles.title: Concern as 300 refugees and migrants reach Greek island of Lesbos
articles.description: Human rights groups and local authorities fear another uptick in refugee arrivals could worsen living conditions.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Porn star seeks Trump testimony on claims
articles.description: Stormy Daniels wants the president to testify about whether he was aware of a "hush agreement".

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: US shooting protesters storm city meeting
articles.description: The brother of shooting victim Stephon Clark and others disrupt a Sacramento city council meeting.

articles.author: Eileen Sullivan
articles.title: Trump Says Second Amendment ‘Will Never Be Repealed’
articles.description: President Trump’s declaration, after days of silence on gun control, came in response to an Op-Ed by the retired Supreme Court Justice John Paul Stevens.

articles.author: Severin Carrell, Stephen Burgen
articles.title: Catalan academic will resist extradition from Scotland to Spain
articles.description: Spanish judges have accused Clara Ponsatí of rebellion and misappropriation of public funds

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Facebook revamps its privacy controls
articles.description: The social network claims the overhaul will make it easier for users to find and edit their data.

articles.author: Sheera Frenkel
articles.title: Facebook Introduces Central Page for Privacy and Security Settings
articles.description: As the social network grapples with the way it handles consumer data, it has unveiled a centralized page for people to control their privacy and security settings.

articles.author: Andrew Pulver
articles.title: Harvey Weinstein assistant Zelda Perkins: 'I was trapped in a vortex of fear'
articles.description: Miramax producer’s former aide says she was made to feel in the wrong when she tried to support a colleague alleging attempted rape by her boss

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Palestinian forces arrest dozens of Hamas supporters in West Bank
articles.description: At least 55 Hamas supporters arrested in aftermath of explosion that targeted PM convoy in Gaza Strip.

articles.author: Matt Apuzzo
articles.title: Sessions and Kushner Square Off, and Prisoners Hang in the Balance
articles.description: Tensions over criminal justice policy have pitted the president’s son-in-law against his attorney general, and resulted in a seesawing approach to prisons.

articles.author: Ellen Barry
articles.title: Cambridge Analytica Whistle-Blower Contends Data-Mining Swung Brexit Vote
articles.description: Christopher Wylie, who testified to British lawmakers, has become a red-haired, nose-ringed matinee idol in some technology quarters.

articles.author: Ali Martin
articles.title: Smith and Warner banned for a year by Cricket Australia for ball tampering
articles.description: Steve Smith and David Warner have been banned for 12 months over the Australia ball-tampering scandal while Cameron Bancroft has been suspended for nine months

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Worboys decision quashed as Parole head quits
articles.description: A decision by the Parole Board to release black cab rapist John Worboys is overturned by the High Court.

articles.author: Owen Bowcott
articles.title: Parole Board must reconsider decision to release John Worboys
articles.description: Court says board should have examined allegations that did not feature in sex attacker’s trial

articles.author: Jamie Grierson
articles.title: Sergei and Yulia Skripal have slim chance of survival, says niece
articles.description: Viktoria Skripal not hopeful about former Russian spy and daughter in nerve agent attack

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: China and North Korea confirm Kim Jong-un visit to Beijing
articles.description: Kim Jong-un ready to give up nuclear weapons if S Korea, US respond 'with goodwill', Beijing says after landmark visit.

articles.author: Mariya Petkova
articles.title: Kemerovo fire: 'Mom, I love you, I'm dying'
articles.description: Popular anger in the Siberian city of Kemerovo, as Russia mourns victims of a shopping centre fire, which killed at least 41 children.

articles.author: BBC News
articles.title: Paris ceremony for French hero policeman
articles.description: Lt Col Arnaud Beltrame's coffin will be taken through the city ahead of Wednesday's memorial service.

articles.author: Alan Blinder and Nicole Perlroth
articles.title: A Cyberattack Hobbles Atlanta, and Security Experts Shudder
articles.description: Atlanta’s city government has been struggling for days with ransomware that has crippled its computer networks and forced it back to doing business with ink and paper.

articles.author: Nicholas Confessore and Matthew Rosenberg
articles.title: Peter Thiel Employee Helped Cambridge Analytica Before It Harvested Data
articles.description: The employee worked for Mr. Thiel’s firm Palantir, a Silicon Valley contractor to American spy agencies. Mr. Thiel is a wealthy Trump supporter and board member at Facebook, where the data was gathered.

articles.title: Kim Jong-un paid 'unofficial' visit to Beijing, Chinese state media confirms
articles.description: Visit was the North Korean leader’s first known trip to a foreign country since he took power after his father’s death in late 2011
